description.en: .Design originates from a problem and coves all the spheres of life. Styles. Graphic design. Product design. Environment design. Design process. Brainstorm. Drafting. New solutions. Performance.
description.et:
Disain saab alguse probleemist, läbides kõiki eluvaldkondi. Stiilid. Graafiline disain. Toote disain. Keskkonna disain. Disainiprotsess. Ajurünnak. Visandamine. Uus lahendus.
Esitlus.

objectives.en: .- to support students` verbalization of ideas, their visualization and performance;
objectives.et: - toetada üliõpilaste ideede verbaliseerimist, visualiseerimist, esitlust;

objectives.en: - to elaborate their skills through different creative activities;
objectives.et: -  kujundada loovtööde kaudu oskusi erinevate disainiülesannetelahendamiseks;

objectives.en: - to give suggestions and strategies for treating design in the classroom
objectives.et: - anda vihjeid ja meetodeid, kuidaskoolitunnis disaini käsitleda.
